mapper.select: SELECT * FROM model ORDER BY CAST(model_id AS UNSIGNED) ASC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO model (model_id, model_brand, model_name, model_category, model_seate_num, model_transmission, model_amount_hour, model_amount_day) VALUES (#{modelId}, #{modelBrand}, #{modelName}, #{modelCategory}, #{modelSeateNum}, #{modelTransmission}, #{modelAmountHour}, #{modelAmountDay});
mapper.update: UPDATE model SET model_brand = #{modelBrand}, model_name = #{modelName}, model_category = #{modelCategory}, model_seate_num = #{modelSeateNum}, model_transmission = #{modelTransmission}, model_amount_hour = #{modelAmountHour}, model_amount_day = #{modelAmountDay} WHERE model_id = #{modelId};
